ygData.subject: Re: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Robert how about trying to find out the initial damage and how much it does each tick and for how many ticks. best way is to find a warrior that is high in
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Robert how about trying to find out the initial damage and how much it
does each tick and for how many ticks. best way is to find a warrior that is
high in hit points. then cast it on them duel if neccessary. then post the
name of spell and the results. also see if the level of caster makes a
difference?
Ken

> From: Robert Lejeune <robert.lejeune@...>
>
> Hmmm druid DoT are: 14th DoT do 120 damage in 60 sec
> 24th DoT do 180 damage in 60 sec
> 29th DoT and -AC on target 182 damage in ?
> sec (Resisted a lot cause it lower AC
> and can stack with the other)
> 34th DoT do ? damage in ? sec
